sentence.Network_cn: 她在城郊找了一家便宜的小汽车旅馆，那旅馆既简陋又难看。

sentence.Network_cn: 人非但不可爱, 而且也是孤苦无助的.

entry.def: If you describe something as unlovely, you mean that it is unattractive or unpleasant in some way.

example.ex: She found a small, inexpensive motel on the outskirts of the town; it was barren and unlovely.
example.tran: 她在城郊找了一家便宜的小汽车旅馆，那旅馆既简陋又难看。

sentences.sentence: "an unlovely ride to work on a crowded train"

auth_sentence.content: Only football could direct so many tourists to such an unlovely location.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Only football could direct so many tourists to such an unlovely location.
